name: Shard Shunner
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.Shapechanger: The Shard Shunner can use their action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into their true form, which is humanoid. Their statistics, other than their size, are the same in each form. Any equipment they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die.
traits.Brave: The Shard Shunner has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
traits.Halfling Nimbleness: The Shard Shunner can move through the space of creatures that is of a size larger than them.
traits.Keen Smell: The Shard Shunner has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
